Of the many pictures I could share of attending the funeral of President George H.W. Bush, none is so special as the picture of the President’s casket draped with the flag of the nation he humbly served and loved. It says it all. Rest In Peace, Mr. President. #Remembering41 pic.twitter.com/67tSEbRSzJ

America has lost an exemplary patriot and public servant. Sue and I send our condolences to the Bush family as we mourn the loss of a true statesman.

I'll never forget the first time our entire family met President Bush in Michigan. He was as warm and friendly as could be. He asked about our kids and even took time to offer my daughter an autograph. He had a special persona that was all about others. pic.twitter.com/d6mm8KHmJo

In a lifetime dedicated to service, in so many important roles, George H.W. Bush rose to the occasion in whatever America asked of him. President Bush guided our nation with honor, integrity, and an unwavering commitment to our founding values.
